name: servisbot-frontend-challenge
description: ServisBot frontend take home code challenge

scripts.start:dev: npm run build --prefix packages/shared && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev --prefix apps/backend" "npm run dev --prefix apps/frontend"
scripts.test:unit: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run test:unit --prefix apps/backend" "npm run test:unit --prefix apps/frontend"
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run test:integration --prefix apps/backend" "npm run test:e2e --prefix apps/frontend"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run lint:fix --prefix apps/backend" "npm run lint:fix --prefix apps/frontend"
scripts.format:all: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run format:fix --prefix apps/backend" "npm run format:fix --prefix apps/frontend"
scripts.npm:install: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,shared" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm install --prefix apps/backend" "npm install --prefix apps/frontend" "npm install --prefix packages/shared"
scripts.docker:up: trap 'docker compose down -v --rmi local' INT TERM EXIT; docker compose up --build
